full_description:
Power Train DL-200T Single Fan CPU Cooler

The Power Train DL-200T single fan CPU cooler is designed to provide exceptional cooling for your processor, allowing it to run efficiently even under intense workloads. The fan operates at a speed of 2200rpm 10% and delivers an air flow of 48 CFM to effectively disperse heat. Despite its outstanding performance, the DL-200T Color is exceptionally quiet, with noise levels as low as 18dba + 10%. For better longevity and performance, the cooler incorporates a 3-pin connector with a hydraulic bearing. It is compatible with both Intel and AMD CPUs and supports Intel LGA1700/LGA115x sockets and AMD AM4 sockets. The fan is 90 x 90 x 25mm, making it a small but effective cooling solution. The DL-200T Color's main feature is its slick design, which adds a splash of color and style to any computer setup. It offers stable performance, silent operation, and vivid illumination, while extending the life of your device.

The Power Train DL-400K White RGB CPU Cooler is a high-performance computer cooling solution. This cooler is designed to work with all Intel sockets, including LGA1700 and LGA115x, making it a versatile option for a variety of systems. The cooler has a 120mm fan that spins at a speed of 1500rpm 10%, ensuring excellent heat dissipation and keeping your CPU at ideal temperatures. The fan moves an air volume of 65cfm 10% and runs at a noise level of 27.1dBA, providing a good mix of performance and noise. For smooth and silent operation, the cooler employs a hydro bearing. The RGB lighting on the Power Train DL-400K White RGB CPU Cooler is one of its distinguishing features, adding a touch of elegance to your system. title: Power Train DL-240 ARGB 240mm Liquid CPU Cooler

full_description:
Power Train DL-240 ARGB 240mm Liquid CPU Cooler

The Power Train DL-240 ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler is a cutting-edge cooling solution created to fulfill the needs of high-performance computing systems. With a cold discharge size of 276x120x27mm and a fan size of 120x120x25mm, the DL-240 cooler is an efficient cooling solution for high-performance systems. The cooler has a hydraulic bearing fan and a water pump with a ternary alloy and ceramic shaft. These elements ensure the cooler's longevity and functionality. The DL-240 cooler is rated for 12VDC operation. The water pump runs at 2600RPM, and the fan runs at 800-1800RPM. These characteristics enable the cooler to properly respond to the cooling needs of your system. The Power Train DL-240 ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler's maximum air volume of 62.32CFM is one of its most notable features. This function, together with a maximum noise level of 33.1dBA, guarantees that your system remains cool while producing minimal noise. This DL-240 cooler is balance of cooling efficiency and noise level makes it an excellent choice for both gaming and professional workstations. Despite the lack of a screen, the cooler supports A-RGB, bringing a stylish touch to your system. This tool allows you to change the appearance of your system to reflect your personal style or the aesthetics of your workspace. The DL-240 cooler has a 276mm radiator with heatsinks made of copper and aluminum. These materials have outstanding heat dissipation properties, guaranteeing that your CPU stays cool even under heavy workloads.
